Whenever another creature you control enters, if it has power or toughness greater than Uzume, Warden of Tenacity's, put a +1/+1 counter on Uzume.
Whenever Uzume dies, if it had four or more counters on it, [b][create a 6/6 black and red Dragon creature token with menace and haste.]
[/b]Flash paradigm {4}{B}{R} [i](You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
